name: Numbers in Our World
activities: Counting everyday objects (toys, fruits) using songs and fingerplays
Matching numerals (1-5) with corresponding quantities of objects
Sorting objects by size (big/small) or color
gameTypes: Interactive games: Matching games with numbers and objects, popping balloons with numbers

name: Shapes Everywhere
detail: Recognizing and naming basic shapes (circle, square, triangle, rectangle)
activities: Identifying basic shapes (circle, square, triangle, rectangle) in the real world (e.g., ball, book, slice of pizza)
Sorting and classifying shapes based on their properties (color, size)
gameTypes: Interactive games: Shape puzzles, matching shapes with objects

name: A Colorful World
activities: Learning and identifying basic colors (red, yellow, blue, green)

name: Sharing and Adding Up
activities: Word problems with simple addition scenarios (e.g., 'We have 2 apples + 1 apple. How many apples do we have now?')
gameTypes: Interactive games: Drag-and-drop addition activities, matching

name: Taking Away
activities: Word problems with simple subtraction scenarios (e.g., 'We had 3 candies, we ate 1. How many candies are left?')
gameTypes: Interactive games: Drag-and-drop subtraction activities, matching
